greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of triangle A104986, which equals the matrix logarithm of triangle A104980.
mathematica: M = Table[If[n == k, 0, If[n == k+1, -n+1, -Coefficient[(1 - 1/Sum[i! x^i, {i, 0, n}])/x + O[x]^n, x, n - k - 1]]], {n, 1, nmax+1}, {k, 1, nmax+1}];
Table[a[n], {n, 0, nmax}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Aug 09 2018, from PARI *)
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Apr 10 2005
